page.title: 16The village of Hunningham.
page.content: Mrs Ellis's nearest shop is in{Weston or{Eathorpe.}Her nearest{doctor}is in{Lillington}and she has to travel quite a way if she becomes ill.After the school's closure it became a {village hall,}but its owner,Lord Leigh wanted to sell it for a price the village couldn't afford.It is now being converted into a house.Mrs Ellis feels that the village people need somewhere to meet and get to know each other. The village has a small church,{ {St.Margarets }and shares a vicar with the parishes of {St.Michael}, Weston Under Wetherley and {St.John The {Baptist}, Wappenbury. Wappenbury also has a Roman Catholic church, {St.Anne's}.
